statements: UPDATE architecture_visualization_tool SET project_name='New Project Name', design_specifications='Updated Design Specifications' WHERE project_id=1;
UPDATE architecture_visualization_tool SET project_plan='Revised Project Plan', design_specifications='Enhanced Design Specifications', project_name='Another New Project Name' WHERE project_id=2;
UPDATE architecture_visualization_tool SET project_name = 'Updated Project Name', project_plan = 'Updated Project Plan' WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE architecture_visualization_tool SET design_specifications = 'Updated Design Specs', project_plan = 'New Project Plan', project_name = 'New Project Name' WHERE project_id = 2;
UPDATE project_plans SET project_name = 'New Project Name' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE design_specifications SET specification_text = 'Updated specifications' WHERE plan_id = 2;
UPDATE project_plans SET design_specifications = 'New Design Specs', project_name = 'Updated Project Name' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE design_specifications SET specification_text = 'Revised Specification Text' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE project_plans SET project_name = 'New Project Name', project_description = 'Updated Project Description' WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET role = 'admin', email = 'admin@example.com' WHERE user_id = 3;
UPDATE project_plans SET project_name = 'New Project Name', project_description = 'Updated project description' WHERE project_id = 1;
UPDATE design_specifications SET design_details = 'Additional details added to design', design_name = 'Updated Design Name' WHERE design_id = 3;
UPDATE ProjectPlans SET project_name='New Project Name', project_owner='John Doe' WHERE project_id=101
UPDATE DesignSpecifications SET designer_name='Jane Smith', design_description='Updated Design Description' WHERE design_id=201
UPDATE ProjectPlans SET project_name='New Project Name', project_description='Updated description' WHERE project_id=1;
UPDATE UserProfiles SET email='newemail@example.com', user_role='Admin' WHERE user_id=5;
UPDATE project_plans SET project_name='New Project Name', project_description='Updated project description' WHERE project_id=1;
UPDATE designers SET designer_email='new_email@example.com', designer_phone='123-456-7890' WHERE designer_id=2;
UPDATE project_plans SET project_name = 'New Project 1', project_description = 'Updated project description 1' WHERE project_id = 123;
UPDATE team_members SET member_role = 'Lead Designer' WHERE team_id = 456 AND member_id = 789;
